property.name: stripe.noSubscriptionsFound
property.value: There are no Subscription updates in the account to be retrieved.

property.name: stripe.mailchimpSubscriptionListIdMissing
property.value: Could not subscribe the customer to the new list since the Plan is not associated with a Mailchimp subscription list.

property.name: stripe.customerEmailMissing
property.value: Cannot add the user to the new subscription list since the email does not exist.

property.name: stripe.customerUnsubscribeSuccessful
property.value: Customer is successfully unsubscribed from the list.

property.name: stripe.mailchimpUnsubscriptionListIdMissing
property.value: Could not unsubscribe the customer from the previous list since the Plan is not associated with a Mailchimp subscription list.
